intro: Sonerila bolavenensis, commonly known as the Bolaven starlingflower, is a flowering plant native to the highlands of Vietnam. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its striking, star-shaped flowers that range in color from white to pink. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments at elevations above 1,000 meters. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
